sentences.sContent: Competitive intelligence or in other words knowing who your competitors are and what they do and how they do it is essential for any business.
sentences.sContent_eng: Competitive intelligence or in other words knowing who your competitors are and what they do and how they do it is essential for any business.
sentences.sCn: 竞争智能，或者换句话说，弄清楚谁是你的竞争者，以及他们做什么和怎样在做，是任何商业的要义。
